data.description:
Monkiverse is an immersive VR locomotion centered game with multiple areas and gamemodes to play in. Connect with other players to create an even more fun experience, playing the game with others greatly increases the enjoyability and excitement.

Prop Hunt is a gamemode where all but a couple of players are made into hiders who are able to morph into props found around the maps, theyre able to position themselves to blend in with the environment. Optionally they can taunt the hunters for an XP boost. The hunters spawn in after the props are given a chance to hide, the hunters are punished for shooting the wrong props and are tasked with hunting down all props before the time runs out.

Horror mode is an interactive series of levels with unique monsters which are constantly chasing the players down, you and other players are tasked with completing the levels' puzzles to escape and be transported to the following levels. Along the way learn the secrets of the environment, how it got to where it is when the player sees it.

Customise your character with a wide variety of cosmetics, fit for the different parts of the character. Purchase mod menus (only usable in modded rooms), that allow for the use of a multitude of power ups and abilities, such as: Rocket Hands, Invisibility, Ghost Mode, Speed Boost, Fish Gun, and many many more!
